attributes.action: WHY ARE WEPAYING STAMP DUTY ON A COMMERCIAL RENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE ARE TAKING OUT ANOTHER 10 YEAR LEASE ON OUR BUSINESS PREMISES. THE QUESTION IS - WHY ARE WE PAYING A STAMP DUTY TAX ON THE PROPERTY WE WILL NEVER OWN !!!!!!!
WHY IS THE LANDLORD NOT PAYING THE TAX AS THEY ARE THE PARTY GETTING ALL THE INCOME ?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. If you want to write to the PM, you can find contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
